Articles.Content:
Hi , I'm albo_IT and came from Italy(I understand English ,but I'm not very good to write it,sorry for the mistakes ).

I started to play KSP two days ago ,then I will do a lot of question (I hope you will give me a lot of answers).

We will see forward,Bye!!!

I bought KSP almost exactly a year ago and have hardly played anything else since, welcome :-)

There are lots of 'how to build rockets' answers in the tutorial in my signature, almost everything else has at least one dedicated tutorial in http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials as well. Bookmark http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28352-The-Drawing-Board-A-library-of-tutorials-and-other-useful-information si the best place for an index to them all.

Have fun.

It was over a year ago that I bought it, and the same for when I joined here.

I'm still having fun in both cases, and hope the same for you. Any questions you have will most definitely be answered, all you have to do is ask.

And your English is understandable, if not perfect. Hello, and welcome to Kerbal Space Program!
Your English is better than my Italian. Welcome!
